name: Blub - Blub - Blub - I am drowning in this intelectual puddle.
name_original: Blub - Blub - Blub - I am drowning in this intelectual puddle.
description:
Cool little game that I made for ludum dare 48.

I am getting better at making games. :)

mouse only

move glipghs towards blue slots

every one have unique function

it is up to the player to discover the rules of gliphs

there are 4 types  of gliphs in total

theme was "deeper and deeper"

Help:

pink stone is a broken heart
purple hexagon doesn't have any arrows on it
